2.title: Top 10 regions by count() of VM Instances
2.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`
| fieldsAdd region = substring(zone, to: -2)
| summarize  count=count(), by:{region}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

5.title: Network: VM Instances Network In Total (bytes)
5.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.compute_googleapis_com.instance.network.received_bytes_count),       
  by:  {instance_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_name
| fieldsadd m=arrayMax(max)
| sort m desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_name
| limit 10

6.title: Network: VM Instances Network Out Total (bytes)
6.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.compute_googleapis_com.instance.network.sent_bytes_count),       
  by:  {instance_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_name
| fieldsadd m=arrayMax(max)
| sort m desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_name
| limit 10

14.title: Top 10 GCP projects by count() VM instances
14.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`
| summarize  count=count(), by:{project_id}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

20.title: Top 10 projects with GKE clusters
20.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:k8s_cluster`
| summarize  count=count(), by:{project_id}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

22.title: Top 10 projects with Instance Groups
22.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:instance_group`
| summarize  count=count(), by:{project_id}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

24.title: GKE clusters - nodes cores (total)
24.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.kubernetes_io.node.cpu.total_cores),       
  by:  {cluster_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, cluster_name
| fieldsadd last_size= arraylast(max)
| sort last_size desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  last_size, interval, cluster_name
| limit 10

26.title: Instance group size over time
26.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.compute_googleapis_com.instance_group.size),       
  by:  {instance_group_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_group_name
| fieldsadd m=arrayMax(max)
| sort m desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_group_name
| limit 10

27.title: Google error logs by resource type

29.title: VM Instances CPU utilzation
29.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.compute_googleapis_com.instance.cpu.utilization),       
 by:  {instance_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_name
| fieldsadd lastMaxCPU=toLong(arrayLast(max))
| sort lastMaxCPU desc 
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  lastMaxCPU, max,  instance_name
| limit 100

30.title: Active Problems
30.query:
fetch events, from: -6h-10m
    | filter in(dt.system.bucket, {"default_davis_events", "default_davis_custom_events", "default_k8s_ops_events"})
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" 
    | filter in(cloud.provider,"gcp") 
    | sort timestamp
    | expand affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids
    | summarize {
      event.status = takeLast(event.status),
      dt.davis.is_duplicate = takeLast(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
    }, by: {event.id,affected_entity_id,cloud.region, cloud.provider, event.description, event.name, affected_entity_ids}
    | filter isNull(dt.davis.is_duplicate) OR not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
    | filter event.status == "ACTIVE"
    | summarize  count()

32.title: Top 10 Instance group by size
32.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.compute_googleapis_com.instance_group.size),       
  by:  {instance_group_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, instance_group_name
| fieldsadd last_size= arraylast(max)
| sort last_size desc
| fieldsKeep   last_size, interval, instance_group_name
| limit 10

33.title: Latest logs
33.query:
fetch logs
| filter (cloud.provider == "gcp" ) and in(loglevel, array("ERROR", "WARNING"))
| fieldsKeep loglevel, 
gcp.project.id, gcp.region, gcp.resource.type, loglevel, content , timestamp
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 100

36.title: Problems by region

37.title: Active problem details
37.query:
fetch events, from: -6h-10m
    | filter in(dt.system.bucket, {"default_davis_events", "default_davis_custom_events", "default_k8s_ops_events"})
    | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" 
    | filter in(cloud.provider,"gcp") 
    | sort timestamp
    | expand affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids
    | summarize {
      event.status = takeLast(event.status),
      dt.davis.is_duplicate = takeLast(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
    }, by: {event.id,affected_entity_id,cloud.region, cloud.provider, event.description, event.name, affected_entity_ids}
    | filter isNull(dt.davis.is_duplicate) OR not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
    | filter event.status == "ACTIVE" 
    | summarize  count(), by:   event.name
    | fieldsRename problem = event.name

40.title: Top 10 projects with Cloud Run Revision
40.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:cloud_run_revision`
| summarize  count=count(), by:{project_id}
| sort count desc
| limit 10

41.title: GKE clusters - nodes memory (total)
41.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.kubernetes_io.node.memory.total_bytes),       
  by:  {cluster_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, cluster_name
| fieldsadd last_size= arraylast(max)
| sort last_size desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  last_size, interval, cluster_name
| limit 10

42.title: Container CPU Utilization
42.query:

  by:  {revision_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, revision_name
| fieldsadd m=arrayMax(max)
| sort m desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, revision_name
| limit 10

43.title: Container memory Utilization
43.query:
timeseries max= max(cloud.gcp.run_googleapis_com.container.memory.utilizations),       
  by:  {revision_name}
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, revision_name
| fieldsadd m=arrayMax(max)
| sort m desc
| fieldsKeep  timeframe,  max, interval, revision_name
| limit 10

45.title: Databases
45.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:spanner_instance` | fieldsAdd  azure.resource.type = "Spanner"
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:redis_instance` | fieldsAdd  azure.resource.type = "Memorystore"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:cloudsql_database` | fieldsAdd  azure.resource.type = "Cloud SQL"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:alloydb_database` | fieldsAdd  azure.resource.type = "AlloyDB"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:bigtable_table` | fieldsAdd  azure.resource.type = "Bigtable"]
| summarize count= count(), by: {azure.resource.type}

46.title: Storage

47.title: Serverless

48.title: Network devices
48.query:
fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_router` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Cloud Router"
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:https_lb` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "HTTP/S Load Balancer"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:interconnect` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Interconnect"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:interconnect_attachment` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Interconnect Attachment"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:internal_http_lb_rule` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Internal HTTP/S Load Balancer"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:internal_network_lb_rule` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Internal Network Load Balancer"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:network_lb_rule` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Network Load Balancer"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:network_security_policy` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Network Security Policy"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:tcp_ssl_proxy_rule` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "Proxy Network Load Balancer,"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:vpc_access_connector` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "VPC access connector"]
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:vpn_gateway` | fieldsAdd  resource.type = "VPN gateway"]
| summarize count= count(), by: {resource.type}
